DOC.brief_summary: OBJECTIVES : I . Determine effect repetitive transcranial magnetic stimulation treatment refractory auditory hallucination patient schizophrenia .
DOC.detailed_description: PROTOCOL OUTLINE : This randomize , double blind study . Patients randomize one two treatment arm . Group I : Patients receive 9 session active transcranial magnetic stimulation ( rTMS ) consist 8 minute rTMS session 1 , 12 minute duration session 2 , 16 minute duration session 3-9 . The total duration stimulation 132 minute . Each session give separate day general session occur consecutive day exception weekend . Group II : Patients receive 9 session sham stimulation , consist 8 minute sham stimulation session 1 , 12 minute duration sham stimulation session 2 , 16 minute duration sham stimulation session 3-9 . The total duration sham stimulation 132 minute . Each session give conducted separate day general session occur consecutive day exception weekend .
